```{r}
DistDisc<-function(n)
{
  x<-c()
  for (i in 1:n)
  {
    uni = runif(1)
    if (uni < 4/24) {x <- c(x,1)}
    else if (uni < 10/24) {x <- c(x,2)}
    else if (uni < 13/24) {x <- c(x,3)}
    else if (uni < 21/24) {x <- c(x,4)}
    else {x <- c(x,5)}
  }
  return(x)
}

Y = DistDisc(1000)
X = c(1/6,1/4,1/8,1/3,1/8)
names(X)<-c(1,2,3,4,5)
```
```{r}
blue <- rgb(0, 0, 1, alpha=0.5)
red <- rgb(1, 0, 0, alpha=0.5)
barplot(X,col=red)
barplot(table(Y)/1000,col=blue,add=T)
```
